item.title: Bypassing Netflix’s Home Restrictions
item.description:
“Love is sharing a password.” — Netflix, on Twitter - 2017-03-10

In 2023, Netflix started to crack down on password sharing. One way they did this was by introducing the concept of Netflix Households. Now, while I get that running a massive streaming platform like Netflix isn’t cheap, I completely disagree with how they’ve chosen to enforce this.
